script:
;;A ゴロツキが…！小
;;B 子供が…！中
;;C 犬が…！大
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_town_day"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
ミョルニルを誘って
街にやってきた

# voice 2001 "myuruniru_0039"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# textflame 1 1
@ミョルニル
人がたっくさ～ん！
にっぎやか～！

# voice 2001 "myuruniru_0022"
# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# textflame 1 1
@ミョルニル
楽しいことはないかな～！
……っ、きゃ！！

# select "ゴロツキが…！" "select_label_01" "子供が…！" "select_label_02" "犬が…！" "select_label_03"
楽しいことはないかな～！
……っ、きゃ！！

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
